Since we've been dealing a lot with equipment here, I had a few
questions about charisma boosts.

No, I'm not getting into the debate on how much they help, I just want a
high charisma =)

FYI, I'm a half-elf bard (medium only) and 15th level, though I'm sure I
can aquire most midlevel things if I work at it. (ugh) Charisma stuff
usually seems pretty cheap anyways.. most don't consider it a priorty
stat raise.

So far, I have this:

Order of thunder (2ac, 5charisma) comes off of Drosco (a zombie necro,
around 6 to 10 I think) in Qeynos Aquaducts. This is great for the stat
buff, bad on ac though. Only gripe I have is that it is No Drop :(

2 Electrum Cat's Eye Braclets (+4 charisma.. no ac IIRC). Jewler made..
paid 10 plat for one, 6 for the other.

My good friend Jim, A Mystic Doll (3 charisma IIRC, no ac, off hand
only) Comes off of Lizzie Shamans in Feerott I think..

Silk Evening Tunic (5 charisma, no ac that I recall) purchased off a
woman vender in South Qeynos

I know jewlers can make a +3charisma necklace, but the Order is nicer if
you can deal with not being able to bank it.

Unfortunatly, I can't wear the leatherfoot raiders cap.. small only.
Shame too, I was looking forward to the +10 :)

I'm working on getting a Crude Stien (+15 charisma, and 10(I
think?)stamina, one charge of minor healing, offhand only) Found off of
Bouncer Hurd in Ferrott (around lvl 30 I believe)

Now anything nice I'm missing? I have a feeling I'm forgetting
something important, but I'm not sure what it is. With base 100
charisma, I can get to around 121 now. Looking to beef it as high as
possible without any spells. Any help is apretiated :).


Lokar, Bard of the Soerbaird
15th level, Fennin Ro
